Kniphofia, on the other hand, is also a flowering perennial plant, but it belongs to the Asphodelaceae family and has distinctive spikes of brightly colored flowers. It is native to Africa and is also characterized as herbaceous, indicating that it has non-woody stems.

- Both are flowering perennial plants.
- Both have herbaceous growth forms.
